pixelbar is currently

We are open almost every wednesday (from 7 pm)
Feel free to drop on by whenever we're open.

The 19th 3D Print & Pizza evening @ Pixelbar Rotterdam

29 Feb 2024

At the 3D print & Pizza evening everyone is welcome with an interest in 3D Printing. Are you an advanced DIY-builder, owner of a print farm, or just orientating before buying your first printer? Everyone is welcome at the Print & Pizza evening hosted at Pixelbar in Rotterdam.

Take your prints or even printer with you to show it to others, to ask questions or get help with problems. Together with the whole group you get tips, maybe someone can help you solve the problem and you get to know others with the same interest.

And of course there will be pizza.

Since the last 3D Print & Pizza evening Pixelbar has had to move again. We are now at the Schiehaven in Rotterdam. The parking at this new space is unfortunately paid.

To access the space you need to go up a set stairs, we sadly don‚Äôt have an elevator.

INFO Print & Pizza night

üóì Thursday 7 March 2024

Pixelbar has moved to a new temporary location

06 Dec 2023

After the devastating fire in June 2023 we were lucky enough to find a temporary space just down the road.

However at the end of November we had to leave this space. But not to worry we were quick to find a new space and are now settled into a new temporary space at the Schiehaven in Rotterdam.

Check out the contact page to find the address.

At the 3D print & Pizza evening everyone is welcome with an interest in 3D Printing. Are you an advanced DIY-builder, owner of a print farm, or just orientating before buying your first printer? Everyone is welcome at the Print & Pizza evening hosted at Pixelbar in Rotterdam.

9 years Keilewerf

26 Aug 2023

Keilewerf has been around for 9 years and that is celebrated with an open day! This year is a bit special because of the big fire, but you can still visit Pixelbar at the old location. We are standing for the last time on the old fundament of Keilewerf 1 at our very own place. This day is a celebration of renewal, resilience and building an inspiring community.

Learn more about our exciting technology and art projects, workshops and activities. Meet the participants of the Pixelbar Foundation and the entrepreneurs of the Keilewerf.

INFO Open Dag Keilewerf

üóì Saturday September 2
üïõ12:00 till 18:00
üí∏ Free entrance
üìç Keilewerf 1, Vierhavenstraat 56, Rotterdam
